Note.name: Note
Note.description: Represents a note, which is text associated with a custom object or a standard object, such as a Contact, Contract, or Opportunity.

Body.description: Body of the note. Limited to 32 KB.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

IsPrivate.description: If true, only the note owner or a user with the “Modify All Data” permission can view the note or query it via the API. Note that if a user who does not have the “Modify All Data” permission sets this field to true on a note that they do not own, then they can no longer query, delete, or update the note. Label is Private.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns the note.

ParentId.description: Required. ID of the object associated with the note.
